ygData.subject: RE: Bard list gettogether - REPOSTED INFO
ygData.msgSnippet: if i can be there i will, just let me know when.  i think it is gonna be hard as hell to get L1 s from Steamfont to Lavastorm, but if i can get a L2 from
ygData.messageBody:
if i can be there i will, just let me know when. i think it is gonna be
hard as hell to get L1's from Steamfont to Lavastorm, but if i can get a L2
from Kelethin to Freeport on day one of release then this is very possible
in the current days of overcrowding =) we may be able to get all there
completely untouched!

Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
